g.text: Collections: users • events • organizers • broadcasting • tickets | Real-time sync • Cloud-hosted • NoSQL
Note: user documents include publicProfile (boolean) used for privacy enforcement

svg.text: Technology Stack: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, Firebase SDK v12.3.0, QR Code Libraries
Architecture: Client-Server with Real-time Database • Modular Component Design • RESTful API Pattern
